verses.name: Deuteronomy 28:45
verses.text: Moreover all these curses shall come upon thee, and shall pursue thee, and overtake thee, till thou be destroyed; because thou hearkenedst not unto the voice of the Lord thy God, to keep his commandments and his statutes which he commanded thee:

verses.name: Deuteronomy 28:46
verses.text: And they shall be upon thee for a sign and for a wonder, and upon thy seed for ever.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 28:47
verses.text: Because thou servedst not the Lord thy God with joyfulness, and with gladness of heart, for the abundance of all things;
